import sys

def main():
  # Read input
  n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
  a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
  b = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
  
  # Compute
  min_wins = min(a[2], b[0])
  max_wins = min(a[2], b[0]) + min(a[1], b[2]) + min(a[0], b[1])
  
  # Print result
  print(min_wins, max_wins)

if __name__ == '__main__':
  main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a1, a2, a3 = map(int, input().split())
    b1, b2, b3 = map(int, input().split())
    lo = max(0, a2 - b1, a3 - b2)
    hi = min(a1, a2, b3, a3, b1, b2)
    print(lo, hi)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    # read input
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    b.sort()

    # calculate
    c = [a[0] - b[2], a[1] - b[1], a[2] - b[0]]
    cmin = max(0, min(c))
    cmax = min(n, max(c))

    # output
    print(cmin, cmax)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a1,a2,a3 = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b1,b2,b3 = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    print(((min(a2,b3)+min(a3,b1)+min(a1,b2)),(max(a2,b3)+max(a3,b1)+max(a1,b2))))

main()
